subject: My EVP sessions
author: iankerry@rocketmail.com
full_text: I have been experimenting with EVP for about a year now (in my home) and i have captured some brilliant evidence for survival.The first voice i captured was that of a little boy saying ''hello''at 1.30 am.It was so clear that others could agree on and the voice could be still heard some fifteen feet away from the recorder.I have captured other voices too, just as impressive.Unfortunately i can't upload because my recorder is a micro cassette type.
